feedback: The remediation successfully eliminates pool lines and adds a server directive, causing the OpenSCAP rule to pass.
concerns: The sed command only targets a specific pool line; other pool entries may remain.
No backup of /etc/chrony.conf was made before modification.
Appending a server line with echo may create duplicate entries.
The service was not reloaded or validated after changes.
suggested_improvements: Create a backup of the configuration file before editing.
Use a broader sed pattern to comment out any line starting with 'pool'.
Verify the resulting configuration with 'chronyc sources' or 'systemctl reload chronyd'.
Ensure only server directives remain and no unintended directives are present.
